events.title: PSG vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17- Mini Match
events.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

events.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
events.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979  and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal  as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.
